name: Iced.
description:
After you are fired from your humble job of working as an ice cream man, the company demands you return their ice cream van.

Pah! I think not!

In a rage, you madly drive up the street throwing ice creams at anyone and anything you see!

But watch out for police and keep an eye on how many ice creams you have left - powerups should pull you through in times of struggles.

Made in Construct 2 by Jake Saul.
